page.title: 12BRAMLEY STATION
page.content: In 1985,at Bramley Station there are Inter-City,goods,local passenger and trains that stop more frequently than the Inter-City trains between Reading and the south-west. School children,businessmen-commuting to London,workers,and shoppers all use the train.People might use the train because it is more frequent than the bus service,quicker-especially from Bramley to Basingstoke and you don't get stuck in traffic jams! In Bramley a person who works on the railway might,issue or collect tickets and work on the platform.It is shift work-early shift from 7a.m.to 4p.m.and late from 2p.m.to 10p.m. At present the railway uniforms are dark blue hats jackets and trousers.The hats have a coloured band coded according to the duties the wearer performs.
